//ALOK SHARMA

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define i64 long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define DBG(vari) cerr<<#vari<<" ==> "<<(vari)<<endl
#define inf 2000000000

typedef pair<i64,i64> pll;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}

int t,p,q,tt=1;
string a,b;
int dp[1002][1002];
		
int lcs(){
	memset(dp,0,sizeof dp);
	for(int i=1;i<=p;i++){
		for(int j=1;j<=q;j++){
			dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1]+(a[i-1]==b[j-1]);
			
			dp[i][j]=max(dp[i][j],max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]));
		}
	}
	return dp[p][q];
}

int main()
{
    //freopen("aain.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("aaout.txt","w",stdout);
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>p>>q;
		cin>>a>>b;
		int ans=p+q-lcs();

		cout<<"Case "<<tt<<": "<<ans<<endl;
		tt++;
	}
	return 0;     
}
